response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. This exceptional item is valued at $1,500,000 to you, and I am extending you an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant savings compared to its full value, providing you with a substantial advantage. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
